content: This is for general discussion for January. More general RWD discussions should be under a new topic
Please join us on 17 Dec 2020 3:30 pm to 4:00 pm ET for track orientation. We look forward to seeing you then!

Thanks to those who joined out orientation session. Attached is the briefing.
RWD-Submission-FDA-Jan2021-HL7-Connectathon-Track-Orientation-2020-12-17.pdf

Please visit our track page for more up-to-date information:
https://confluence.hl7.org/display/FHIR/2021-01+Vulcan+-+Real+World+Data+%28RWD%29+Submission+to+FDA
Is the source code for the FHIR 2 SDTM app available for download?
At least if you mean that one ... which is my own implementation ...
